location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 2024/1939 'Desire of Japanese diplomatic staff to visit Bahrain and Kuwait'

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at inside back cover with 8; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence relating to a proposed visit of Japanese diplomatic staff to Bahrain and Kuwait. The main correspondents are the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf and the India Office. The main recipients are the Political Agents in Kuwait and Bahrain and the Secretary of State for India.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India, United Kingdom
